page.title: 12ECOLOGY-GENERAL
page.content: The two major constituents of this area are housing and improved grassland. The built up area has the usual restricted range of commensal species(starlings,sparrows etc.). The grassland being 'improved' has an impoverished species range.However the majority of field boundries on the O.S.map still have{hedges.}The hedges are maintained by flailing:none are currently laid.The roadside verges are also currently being maintained less aggressively after several years of excessive cutting. The pockets of woodland are principally broad-leaved,the most interesting being some {alder call}by the Medina river at the extreme south of the area.
